CustomField.formula: IF( OR( ISPICKVAL(Business_Unit__c, 'Fleet'), ISPICKVAL(Business_Unit__c,'Industrial') ), IF( OR( ISPICKVAL(Organization_Size__c,"1000 - 4999"), ISPICKVAL(Organization_Size__c,"5000+") ), "Enterprise", IF( OR( Number_of_Assets__c >= 41, Number_of_Vehicles__c >= 21 ), "Mid-Market", "Commercial" ) ), '' )
CustomField.label: Fleet Segment
